title: Star Guardian Quiz wont load
body: Whenever I try to load the Star Guardian quiz, I sit there and wait for it to load.  And I continue to just wait.  It never loads for me.  It just stops at this:  http://prntscr.com/csuds3  but it gives me the option to refresh the page like it finished loading.  I try that and still nothing.  It slows everything else down like it's still loading something, but I've sat here for almost an hour each time I try to load it and it never leaves that screen in the screenshot.  I don't have anything else running either when I try to load it.  Is there anything that can help?

replies.body: This may be an issue with assets or plugins on your browser failing to function, or maybe even an extension getting int he way.  What happens if you try this on another browser, or even Incognito mode?  You may need to[ clear your cache ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)as well, in case there's something blocking the way.  Hope that helps!
I just did that and I still can't get it to load. Alternatively, I see images on my iphone, but I can't take the quiz.
